featured.text: Most people would think that aside from comets and stars there is little else out there.
Hidden deep in a small alley among various tiny shops, the entrance of the Michelin star restaurant is barely ______ to passersby.
A lot of ancient civilizations, __(37)__ the Egyptians, Hindus, Greeks, and Mayans, have left writings and __(38)__ which indicate contacts with superior beings “from the stars.”
He marketed his brand by giving clothes to famous MTV stars and featuring teen stars in his print ads.

other.text: In order to write a report on stars, we decided to ______
the stars in the sky every night.
Continuous as the stars that shine And twinkle on the Milky Way, They stretched in never-ending line Along the margin of a bay:

definition.zh_def: 恆星，宇宙中的一種發光天體，主要由氫和氦組成，通過核融合產生能量。
definition.en_def: A luminous celestial body made of hydrogen and helium, generating energy through nuclear fusion.
definition.example: The star twinkled brightly in the night sky.
